Antonio Ferrandis https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antonio_Ferrandis 0 Antonio Ferrandis Monrabal (28 February 1921 – 16 October 2000) was a Spanish actor, remembered especially for the role of Chanquete in the Spanish television serie Verano azul. Antonio_Ferrandis_Monrabal ( 28_February_1921 – 16_October_2000 ) was a_Spanish_actor , remembered especially for the_role of Chanquete in the_Spanish_television_serie_Verano_azul .
